entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
